directions.text: Process skinned kiwis and juice from lime until smooth.
Strain out pulp, refrigerate juice overnight.
Boil 2 cups water with sugar with medium high heat stirring for 10 mins making simple syrup.
Transfer simple syrup to an ice bath and stir until well chilled. Refrigerate until ready to use.
Mix kiwi mixture and 1 ¼ cup simple syrup in an ice cream maker for 12 mins, and let freeze overnight.
